content:
## Operations

* Contact
    * Create a new contact
    * Delete a contact
    * Get a contact
    * Get all contacts
    * Update a contact
* Custom Resource
    * Create a new item
    * Delete an item
    * Get an item
    * Get all items
    * Update an item
* Note
    * Create a new note
    * Delete a note
    * Get a note
    * Get all notes
    * Update a note
* Opportunity
    * Create a new opportunity
    * Delete an opportunity
    * Get an opportunity
    * Get all opportunities
    * Update an opportunity
